website_summaries.verdict: One of the best collapsible water bottles on the market, this product amazes for its clever design and remarkable durability.
pros: Shatter-proof silicone perfect for your outdoor adventures
Holds both hot and cold liquids
cons: A little more difficult to roll than a few customers anticipated
Some complained of a strange odor coming from the bottle

customer_reviews.title: so I sort of made fun of her and ask her do you really need ...
customer_reviews.text: OK - so let me first say, my wife was the one who brought this, she has a thing for water bottles... so I sort of made fun of her and ask her do you really need ANOTHER water bottle?? But, let me just say, by the end of our trip, this water bottle was no longer her's it was MINE. Twist cap amazing, it doesn't leak and my kids were able to use it.. i like that it's compact and you can just throw it in your backpack when it's not filled with water. and yes, the wife went ahead and order herself another one.. so now we have 2.
customer_reviews.author: Miyagi54

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Bottle for Travel!
customer_reviews.text: Great Water Bottle - I appreciate the twist cap - helps with hygiene - easy to clean - the strap comes in handy to attach to your backpack or bag. Fits in most pocket holders with a little finesse - perhaps make another model that is not as wide? Otherwise Perfect! Picture is of me in Chiang Mai Thailand with the Nomader! (and an elephant!).
customer_reviews.author: Jenna L. Tarasco

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Rugged and Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Bought two as Christmas gifts for my Son (27) and Wife. They both have really liked it so far for gym time. They throw it in their bags (rolled up) and then use it at the gym. Very good construction and heavy duty cap. the strap is sturdy and has held up to very cold weather sitting in Son car overnight a few times. Great product and I am a genius for buying.
customer_reviews.author: LakeMead Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great travel water bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for a trip to Europe. They are very light to carry easy to fill and convenient for travel. I am very pleased with this purchase! It saved a lot of money to have the water bottle with us all day long and just fill up rather than having to buy new bottles of water. I got some of the Night-ize clips so they could easily be clipped to our backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: The best travel water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Well this is the coolest thing ever! I travel quite a bit and i usually don't take a bottle with me because they are big and bulky and i usually loose something or it! This collapsible water bottle is a perfect traveling accessorie. It stays collaped until after security then i fill it up, for the trip. Its a good size and fits my side compartment in my travel backpack and the cap screws in securely so i don't have to worry about it opening accidently spilling all over the place. I follow the instructions on how to clean it and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you follow their steps to "pre-condition" the bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you follow their steps to "pre-condition" the bottle. It goes a long way to improving the taste of the water. Initially the taste was a bit off, but after letting it sit with boiling water inside (as per their website) for 2 hours and running it through the dishwasher as well, I'm enjoying this a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: More than it seems
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I first opened the package. I figured this bottle would be extremely flimsy and would not hold up to regular use, and especially would not hold up to hot drinks. I must say, I've been pleasantly surprised with this bottle! It does fold down extremely small for travel (especially as an airplane carryon). I certainly recommend this bottle and might even buy another for myself
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle for travel. It is durable, compact when not in use and versatile. One of the main reasons I like this collapsible bottle over others is the sliding band on it. It allows you to hold it firmly without squeezing the bottle and squirting the contents out of the top and all over the place. I bought mine and a friend liked it so much, she bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: multi-use, no odor, holds shape, extremely convenient, awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the cactus water bottle, but the newer versions had a chemical flavor, and I found that after a while they began to leak. So I switched to the nomader and love it. I never use the plastic sleeve that goes around it -- I just toss that out immediately. No chemical flavor. Useful for keeping myself warm (I put hot tea in it and drink it / hold it in my hands), useful for icing injuries, add water, freeze entire bottle, and go hiking, etc. Very easy to wash, durable. I bought a second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Yozhik

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Could Give this a 4.5
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bottle. The size of the drinking nozzle is neither too teeny nor too wide -- just large enough to get a good glug without effort. The nozzle opens and closes at the top with just a quick twist and positively does not leak. When the entire cap is off, the wide mouth makes it easy to clean. No funky plastic smells and I'm sure it would fold down easily if packed. Deducted a half star because I use this only when I'm running, and I wish it had a one of those sleeves to make hand-held grip while running a bit easier. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: RicketyFence

customer_reviews.title: Stands upright even when empty! :)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 bottles (a My Friday, a Shoke bottle, and a Nomander). The only one that stands upright without a fairly full amount of liquid is the Nomander. The Nomander doesn't fold up as compactly at the other two bottles but it stands upright even when empty and, to me, that's most important. I haven't actually used it yet but, thus far, it seems to fit my needs (large capacity, large opening for ice cubes, stands upright even when empty, fits into most water bottle holders (in backpacks, etc.), and still folds up compactly enough).
customer_reviews.author: JQuindaro

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious product
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this water bottle! I go one for each of my kids and their partners, and for my husband and me. The design is really ingenious, and it seems very well made. The fact that you can put hot beverages in it means that my kids can take tea on hot mornings (the insulated sleeve lets them hold it comfortably) then use it for water throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Storywoman

customer_reviews.title: It is foldable and has good capacity but it was annoying to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this water bottle. I was looking for a foldable bottle with more capacity but this wasn't it. It is foldable and has good capacity but it was annoying to use and clean. A water bottle shouldn't have that many directions just to be able to use it! I guess I did the first one wrong and it smelled bad so they sent me a new one, then I followed all the preconditioning steps but still wasn't right. Both of the bottles developed a film after being washed. And now just smell like soap and lemon which makes the water taste bad. Gonna stick to vapur bottles from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M Taillie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Did not like the smell inside the bottle, even after following first time directions (soaked over night in lemon juice) the smell didn’t go away for a while. Even when it did go away, there’s still a distinct smell in the water that I did not like. Also Folding was very difficult, to the point of unpleasant. My search for portable water carrier continues.
customer_reviews.author: Trinushka

customer_reviews.title: Ready for Europe!
customer_reviews.text: Great Bottle! Very strong smell on the inside so I heated some water in a pot, squeezed some lemon and dipped all the pieces multiple times - let them dry and smell/taste was gone! We got the WHITE color because we like seeing what we’re drinking! I’m getting ready to purchase a couple more! Especially love the grip and cap/screw! Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: RissAndCo

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: In a effort to get away from disposable plastic water bottles I wanted something I could take with me when I travel. This folds up thereby taking up less space in my luggage and so suites my needs nicely. Then it really came in handy when my daughter had wrist surgery and therefore only the use of one hand for a while. She could keep this in bed with her because the lid screws down making it leakproof. One handed unscrewing to drink was absolutely possible. The entire lid comes off for a wide opening to fill. Ended up buying another one for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle for anyone
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this bottle. It holds a good amount of water that is easy to carry. The water does not taste nor smell any different, and when it's empty I can roll it to save space on my bag or stroller. Also if my toddler decides to drink from it ( as he usually does, thinking that my water tastes better than his water...) I don't mind if he drops it, since is not going to break. I also like the twist on the cap. Nice feature. I don't find any con's on this bottle. So far very pleased with this product. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: M W

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Because of being lightweight, I bought two of these for my sons to take to school. They already carry enough weight as is. The bottles are excellent. Easy to clean, are leakproof, don't take too much space and they're lightweight. About a month ago my son dropped his bottle from the second floor and the cap broke. I emailed the Nomader's customer service to ask if I could purchase another cap. They said they didn't sell those, but that they'd send it to me for free. They asked me which color were my bottles and ended up sending two of each! I couldn't be happier with this company and will definitely buy more from them.
customer_reviews.author: JPastro

customer_reviews.title: Very Difficult to Roll The Bottle Up
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these, they seem fairly sturdy. As soon as they arrived we tried to fold them up. It’s extremely difficult to roll up the silicone body! I’m not elderly, but I do have arthritis, my hub does not. I thought it was just me. Nope! He had just as much trouble as I did! We’re keeping them to use for hiking, but will possibly try another popular version of a collapsible water bottle later on. If we had known how hard these are to roll up we would not have ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: shoremama

customer_reviews.title: Held up great
customer_reviews.text: I just used this bottle for three weeks of travel. I love how light weight it is and that it rolls up. I’m comparison to my everyday stainless steel water bottle, it seemed to build up residue slower (aside from the mouth). The only issue I really had was sometimes when I had it rolled up it would unroll. That could likely be user error. Ha, ha. If only there were a way insulate this bottle so water would stay cold in warm climates.
customer_reviews.author: Kamalineequa

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Product - A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: So much about this product is great. The design detail, which I appreciate, and you can't really tell until you get and use the product, is very apparent. How the cap opens and closes is simple and "true". You can do it without looking. The drinking spout is comfortable and somehow delivers more water than you think it will. Also good. Relatively light weight. Rolling it up takes a bit of practice. Overall it is a very well designed product and over delivers. The only thing I would wish for is it keeping water colder, longer. I didn't think it would, based on the material it is made from, but I can wish. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: hamilton wallace

customer_reviews.title: Leakproof
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite travel bottles. Took them empty through the airport, then filled before getting on plane. Secure screw top opening for drinking. Wide enough. Can unscrew lid and put in ice cubes - no problem. 4 different colors for our 4 member family. Worked beautifully and very durable. The moment you receive them, fill with hot water and a tablespoon of lemon or lime juice. Let sit overnight. That gets rid of any plastic taste for those of you that are concerned about that sort of thing. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: KBarbieri

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my last trip and I'm very happy with it. I normally purchase overpriced water in a plastic bottle once inside the airport, but this is so much better. I rolled it up and stuck it in the backpack until I got through security and then filled it at the drink station in the restaurant inside as per the waitresses instructions. Depending on the airport they may have filling stations - I found one in Seattle and LA. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: C Wartman

customer_reviews.title: New and taking it on a trip in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my recent trip to Hawaii. I had a 9 hour flight, plus time in the airport, and I have to drink 8-10 glasses of fluids daily. Taking a regular water bottle and having to store it in my bag just took up too much space. This cup also has a screw top that stays connected, so you don't have to keep up with a screw top and it is not hard to get open, like some of the ones that you have to pry up. I think being able to roll it up for storage will make travel easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.Perry

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were hoping
customer_reviews.text: Four of us traveled Tibet with these things. Easy to drink from and clean (especially when we returned and put them in the dishwasher). Never leaked. Great to be able to fill with any temperature beverage. Easy to grip and the rigid plastic collar gives them just the right amount of structure. It took me a while to figure out how to collapse them because the instructions make it look like you should start by folding the bottle in half below the collar. Never worked. The video shows the correct method. Roll it up as tightly as you can. Then pull the strap around and hook it. Easier with practice.
customer_reviews.author: KPC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cap design
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cap design - very hygienic and easy to open. Loved that it had totally no odor. Strongly wish they also made a smaller volume size as only 1 water bottle of this size can fit in my car door storage bin due to its height — and I would love to have 2 in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, just too big.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning this. While it's super easy to hold, the top was just too big for what I wanted it for. I needed something that collapses to be a lot smaller than this as it took up too much space in my bag. If you're looking for the experience of a regular water bottle, but want it to be a bit smaller than this would be perfect for you. To me, the compatibility was the most important feature though.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love this bottle
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions for cleaning before first use. Had NO plastic taste at all. It's a sturdy bottle. Love that you can also use it for hot beverages. The sleeve to hold the bottle will be helpful when there's coffee. Just ordered a 2nd bottle so that both my husband and myself will have one for our upcoming European trip. It doesn't fold as small as some of the other bottles online, but the quality is so superior and the bottle so versatile, that to me it seems worth the trade off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clip broke (but customer service came through)
customer_reviews.text: Edited: This maker contacted me via email and offered a new bottle with a metal clip and a replacement clip for the old bottle. I received it today and am very pleased. I changed the rating from 2 stars to 5. Excellent customer service. The following was the old rating description. The bottle seems perfect for travel, but the clip on the strap broke the very first time I clipped it together. Am hopeful it will still work for travel as it can just be squished into my carry on bag. Haven't evaluated yet if it is leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I initially learned about this product from an article in Condé Nast. I ordered for my daughters, who work out regularly and myself. I love that it doesn't sweat, it keeps water cold enough to drink, ice cubes fit in it and it squishes when you touch it. I love it so much that I've managed to lose 2 of them (my carelessness) and recently ordered 2 more. It is my daily go to bottle. I've taken it on airplanes and it's easy to fill up at the airport. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Walker

customer_reviews.title: great bottle, great company
customer_reviews.text: I like a lot of the features of this bottle: collapsible, stands up on own, flip top, no leaking, nice color and material. I had one complaint that it was hard to hook into the rolled up position. The company read my comment and offered to send me a new bottle for free which fixed the problem. I am 100 per cent satisfied with the new bottle. Great product, great company. I use this bottle frequently for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Lori T. Sly

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle. Color is as shown. Easy to use, fold, keep clean. The black hard plastic part was a bit difficult to push up when folding, but other than that it was fine. Used some ice in it and it didn't sweat. Never leaked <-- that's a definite plus! Very pleased and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Bean

customer_reviews.title: It's silicone
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient and easy to fill to take your own water after getting through TSA at the airport. One difference I noticed from my regular-use glass bottle is that after using the silicone bottle for a couple of days the taste changes -- time for a good scrub! I will use this for travel; be diligent cleaning and switch to a glass upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: R Happy

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, but hard to roll up
customer_reviews.text: But it’s def not easy to roll up as it is in the video! But I love how light it is, it’s easy to carry on the plane. It was too big for my purse pocket so I had to carry it so I’m glad it was light. If it’s not half full I had an issue with it trying to tip over. But the seal is tight, as long as you screw it in correctly which I did not once
customer_reviews.author: Nikki R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel bottle!
customer_reviews.text: We are frequent travelers and I’m always looking for water here and there, buying a water bottle, etc. My husband bought me this and it’s great! Fits in my backpack for a 2-3 day trip, full of up at our hotel or Airbnb before adventuring our for the day and slips right around my wrist with the loop. I’ve taken it all over Europe; folds right back up into my bag at the end of our trip
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service - really care about their product
customer_reviews.text: The silicon is sturdy and you can struggle with rolling it up. It absolutely does not leak and is very durable. UPDATE: Without any expectation, I was contacted by customer service. The new bottle is wonderful and I use it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Wrightwriteswords

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: I really like this water bottle a lot. However, if I let water sit in it overnight, it'll taste like silicone the next day. The silicone taste goes away after I wash it, but it'll come back the next day if I let water sit in it too long.
customer_reviews.author: Monie

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review Below Original Review----Used for 4 months, mold started to grow in cap crevices that i could not clean. Eventually spread to interior when i forgot to completely empty and dry out one weekend. Tossed in trash. Updated Review- Nomader reached out and replaced my bottle proactively. Amazing- The bottle is great. I am being more careful maintaining bottle as i think the mold issue i had before was my mistake not the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Plasticy taste.
customer_reviews.text: Had a plasticy taste since I bought it a few weeks ago, even after several hot water washes and putting it through the dishwasher. This is the second one I've bought and the first had no such problem. They must have switched manufacturing systems.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Bell

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous travel water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after researching other bottles thoroughly. Used this summer in my travels across two countries in Europe, and then for an extended road trip in the US. It is my go-to for travel now. Rolls up small if you need it to, washes well, no funky smells/tastes, seals excellently (had NO leaks, ever), opens wide enough to add ice (if you're lucky enough to ever find ice, lol). Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kmcquivey

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Bad smell and taste. Tried to clean following the instructions (1st to leave overnight with boiled water and lemon) but no luck. The soapy taste cannot get out. Also, it does not leak but the bottle sweats a lot making it hard to grab and had to cover it with an additional bag to not damage my the stuff around. It is uncomfortable. Not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Noasis

customer_reviews.title: I love these bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can freeze this one with less worry of it cracking unlike past bottles. Update Sept 24,2020: I ended up buying a second bottle. Both still going strong. Easy to maintain. Conveniently can fit in work bag and lunch coolers. Like having a last resort Ice Pack when reusables have thawed out. Worth replacing if ever damaged., which is going to be slim to none chances. A great alternative when you don’t want to have a noisy canteen bottle, and you’ll give up buying or using one time use plastic bottled water. The next best product would be hydro bag backpacks but unless you are really that active Nomader bottles are all you could need.
customer_reviews.author: E.S. R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price. Great Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for an Iceland trip and they worked perfectly. I recommend attaching a carabiner to the top plastic ring to which the roll-up strap attaches. This way, you can clip it to anything to reduce the chance of losing it. Worked great clipping on to my backpack and daypack. The roll-up design works very well, much better than I thought it would. Great to be able to make it smaller when necessary (airport security). I (along with my wife) was initially skeptical on the price, but after using these on an extended trip, I'm so happy that we pulled the trigger. Totally worth the price and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MoveAlong

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle for hikers
customer_reviews.text: Love these water bottles! We bought one for each member of our family as our extra personal water containers for our back country hike in the Tetons. These are durable, easy to clip to a belt or you bag. The colors are nice and bold, I’m sure the high visibility ensured our kids (9 and 10) never lost track of them. They were easy to keep clean and the mouth was wide enough to be easily used with our UV water purifier. It was nice knowing we had collapsible water bottles that could handle boiling water, if needed. Highly recommended for serious hiking but also for sports practices and gym workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Nomander bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for hiking but it fits perfectly in the bottle holder on my bike and is easier to use than a Camelback, so it is now my go-to for hiking. My son loves it so much that he wants one, too. The trick with the lemon and hot water worked beautifully and my water always tastes good. A great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: the construction quality is much better.
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is very handy for travelling. Only thing is that every once in awhile, I have a hard time collapsing it enough to clip it (I think it has to do with how you deal with rolling the bottom, flat/round part of the bottle). Also, I know this speaks to the quality of the materials, but just know that this roll-up bottle is a little larger while rolled up than other roll-up water bottles. It was larger than I expected, even rolled up (and a rather awkward shape), however, the construction quality is much better.
customer_reviews.author: krysti

customer_reviews.title: Used it for a backpacking trip and loved it
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a 3 month backpacking trip and I loved it! I didn't feel any weird taste in the water and it was easy to roll in. The only thing I would add is a hoop or something so you can hook it or strap it somehow to a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Pichon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the rollup feature
customer_reviews.text: i have used rollup style water bottles for years. LOVE the feature as i detest having to carry around a bottle when it is empty. i can put this in my pocket when im done. one thing i would NEVER do with it tho is to put in back of seat pocket on the plane! i can not tell you how many times i have left one there! i will attach it to my purse strap or something! lesson learned finally!!!!
customer_reviews.author: River Lass

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: We followed the instructions before we used the 3 we ordered and loved them (boiling water, lemon)! No plastic taste or odor. Rolling it down and clipping it was a little tight, but not a problem. It is not tiny when rolled down, but still saves you a lot of space. Had no problems with it standing - full or empty. Yes - they are expensive - but you get what you pay for. At $4 a water bottle at the airport - these are worth it. Just carry it on empty and fill it after you pass security. Did not leak, either. P
customer_reviews.author: Cee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Best Travel Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: As someone who walks to and from work every day and travels a good amount I've been on the hunt for a good collapsable water bottle for ages. This is it! It rolls up easily to take up very little room, would fit in most handbags. It's comfortable to hold, holds a pretty good amount of water, does not leak and is super easy to fill and clean with it's wide mouth. I've also found it amazing for travel.
customer_reviews.author: K. Friday

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine from Amazon a couple years ago and used it almost every day for over two years. This water bottle was with me everywhere and on all sorts of crazy adventures! I would even purposely huck it up straight into the air or off cliffs and still survive! Can't believe I had it for so long until I unfortunately lost it on a trip, but I think I am ready to move on and get another one, definitely recommend guys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clip is faulty!!!  Unbelievable workmanship!
customer_reviews.text: Rolls up perfectly for easy travel. Once the water is in the bottle the bottle easily stand upright because of the heavier plastic ring around the body of the bottle. The best part is that they really mean leak proof! I have had this bottle upside down and not one drop has leaked out! A Nomader fan until the clip BROKE not even a month into using it.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitra Rizzi

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a 2 week trip to Europe, and have continued to use it ever since. It never leaked, and I love that you can roll it up and throw it in your bag. I have some weakness in my hands and rolling it up and using the clasp took me a couple tries to get used to it, and it's a little effort, but holds well and I love it. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a durable reusable bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Zech Doran

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell you how much I hate this bottle
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I hate this bottle...It stinks... Literally.. gets moldy very easily and even after you wash and bleach it the stink stays.. Save your money and get stainless steel bottles...I have tried them all and this is the worst by far.. I would give Zero stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: joe oliveri

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: This is the most expensive water bottle I have ever purchased. I have had trouble getting the odor out of it like others mentioned. I did the boiling water 3 times and each time was better than prior. I have trouble grabbing it as it is collapsible.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: i love this water bottle and carry it everywhere with me. i get lots of questions on it because it's so cool! some of the reviews say there is a plasticy taste, i didn't experience that at all. but i also followed the instructions the seller sent to prepare the bottle for use. so perhaps those buyers didn't? anyways, this is worth the price and i plan on buying more as gifts because it's so dang cool.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself in a month.
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work and was fed up with spending $$ on water and producing plastic waste at airports (yes, I know that airline fuel is horrendous but every little bit counts, right?). This is fantastic for travelers as it's light and rolls up into a compact form. Will buy another when I inevitably leave this one on a plane....
customer_reviews.author: P. Mimula

customer_reviews.title: Travel friendly, but...
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine, ive used it on two trips and loved it! Im recently seeing an issue where if i leave water in it for a couple of hours it will taste very plasticy. I might have to exchange it or buy a different one soon, which is unfortunate cause i like every thing else about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bottle for my son who travels by plane often. It’s nice because he can roll it up so it takes less room but when needed it fills up and doesn’t topple over. Then when empty just rolls it up again. It’s 22oz which is a nice size but my son says he would like it even more if it was 32oz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry bottle that could use some design improvements
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is a neat design. The rolling of the bottle works well so it does the trick for traveling. The two issues I have with the bottle however are: 1. The type of material it's made from collects everything. It's not a smooth rubber/plastic so everything sticks to it. 2. The way you bring the strap around to hold it folded up - does not keep it held well. It's just a metal loop you put around a notch. It doesn't hook to keep it locked in place. Generally does the job for a compact, easy to carry bottle that could use some design improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Travel Water Bottle Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is amazing. We have purchased four of them and will order a fifth one. We LOVE the wide opening so that you can put ice in but ABSOLUTElY LOVE how compact it is. We have added a clip to it so that it attached quickly to a backpack. These bottles are headed to Africa, Thailand, and Germany. We are excited that we found this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Marti F.

customer_reviews.title: Great lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two bottles over two years ago and have used and cleaned them nearly daily. I was having an issue with some black mold starting to grow around the inside neck of both bottles, even after multiple washes in the dishwasher. The Nomander people immediately identified the issue and sent out replacement bottles. I used these bottles as my daily, at my desk or in my car bottles. When the cap is on tightly, they are leak proof (make a mental note of that!) and roll up for storage. They fit in my car cup holder and are easy to travel with. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't get a plastic smell or taste at all. I put a carabiner on it and attached it to my backpack. I didn't roll it up most of the trip. It swung around through security check points, under airline seats and in and out of the car trunk. Holds a lot of water. This is my trip essential especially when flying from now on. My only complaint has to do with the fact the refill stations at ORD don't have cold water. Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: CAB

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste keeps coming back
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bottle for a few months now, I have a problem with the plastic taste or rubber taste. If I wash it good and fill it with freshwater it is good for about an hour or two and then the taste is back. I’ve tried different ways of cleaning and I’m just frustrated, I do not use it anymore now. I really like everything else about the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Roger D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Handy Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it folds and is easily carried. The lid is outstanding. I wish it could keep things colder a little longer, but I suppose that would require eliminating its capacity to fold. On balance I'm very happy I have this bottle. I keep cold water in a large steel bottle in the car and always have the Nomader handy to fill and drink from.
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOTTLE FOR TRAVEL
customer_reviews.text: I Iike having a water bottle, but hate having to carry an empty big one around while traveling. Love this approach. Used it for 6 weeks in Nepal and SE ASIA and worked great. Easy to filtrer water into as well. The Only issue is that you must remember to screw down the little cap on the spout. I only made that mistake once, early on. Otherwise, it does NOT leak. great bottle and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Foodmaven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water bottle for travel
customer_reviews.text: This foldable bottle represents a good idea, carefully carried out. Unlike other collapsible bottles, it does not collapse when full and is quite stable. It is easy to drink from. I have noticed no off tastes or odors. It does not leak. My husband and I each travel with a rolling carryon and a backpack for as much as a month that often includes hiking. This saves space in our luggage when rolled up and provides an adequate amount of drinking water for day hikes when full. The circumference is larger than some bottles, so you do need to be sure your gear will accommodate it.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Travelers
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a trip shortly after purchase and I love this bottle! It rolls up conveniently, and after you make it through airport security you can fill at a water fountain for your trip rather than having to buy bottled water. The spout screws shut so there's no leakage but it is easy to open when you want a drink. If a sink is a bit small for you to fit it under the tap, the bottle bends! If the makers could design a strap that hooks onto itself when the bottle is unrolled (so you can hang it from a bag or belt) that would be a terrific addition.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kunz

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time and I used a Tbsp of baking soda, and a cap full of Clorox after filling it with water to get rid of the smell. Be sure to let it sit in solution over night. It holds lots of water and is a good water bottle that I use on my daily 3 mile walk.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for water in any activity
customer_reviews.text: this bottle is just perfect for hiking take along. It folds down to just the cap when empty so you dont have to carry around a big empty bottle. I saw this and knew that this was the product for our trip. wont take up much space in suitcase for taking it wherever you going if you have to pack suitcases for that trip. I have used other type bottles but they always were a bother after empty taking up space in our hiking bag. I would recommend highly to outdoor people who are always carrying a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Thompson

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I've had this water bottle for about a week now. I LOVE it. It is honestly one of the best water bottles I have ever used. I can stuff it just about anywhere, even if there's still a little water in it. I've dropped it, had it stay upside down and I've seen 0 leaks/cracks/damage. My favorite thing is that during yoga I don't have to leave a pose to drink water by tilting my head back, I just suck or squeeze the air out and bam, there's the water. I honesty can't say enough nice things about this bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift for Travelers
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bottle - excellent for travel! I got one for my son's trip to Amsterdam, and he couldn't be happier. It's lightweight, and tucks away easily. I'd recommend these for any travel, from road trips to European sojourns.
customer_reviews.author: Perthenia Eilers

customer_reviews.title: Don’t attach to a bag for carrying make sure strap is secure.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottle as it held a large amount of water and yet I could fold it down for travel. Unfortunately I only had the bottle for a week as had it clipped to my bag as usual via a carabiner and the strap must have broken as the bottle came off and the carabiner Was still there. I found it but at that point someone had actually ran it over with a bike :(.
customer_reviews.author: SherryV

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bottle for a trip to Disney world and thought a collapsible bottle would be clutch to have and I was right. This bottle was super convenient when I needed to fill up for water because I was thirsty. I was thirsty all the time, It gets very hot in Florida!
customer_reviews.author: Donna L.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This bottle absorbs the stuff you put in it, starting with the soap to clean it. We were unable to get the soapy flavor out. Also, it came unhooked all the time. Big disappointment, returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: PATTY D

customer_reviews.title: This is it!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other 'collapsible' water bottles, and this one is great - sturdy and easy to clean unlike other brands I have tried. The black plastic piece is entirely unnecessary though, and I use it to this day with no issues collapsing the bottle or it standing on it's own - especially on the plane, never had an issue. I will definitely continue to use Nomader.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for a trip to Thailand that corona unfortunately has postponed. Fortunately I went hiking and was able to use this and we definitely have made it a permanent travel water bottle. Only thing you’re gonna want to stretch the bottle a bit it’s hard to roll at first.
customer_reviews.author: jessica krapf

customer_reviews.title: Great investment, convenient and great for the environment.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this collapsible water bottle to use on our vacation in Iceland. IT IS FANTASTIC. I plan to use it very often now. It’s convenient, seals very well, and I love that it can be rolled up to save space. I have 2 toddlers and they can both drink from this bottle unassisted. I’m looking forward to using this bottle everywhere we go. I highly recommend it for everyone, and wish they made a smaller version for my toddlers!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nomader
customer_reviews.text: Hi Bryan, My daughter gave me a gray Nomader bottle as a gift. I took it on a cruise soon after I got it. My Nomader has already been to the Netherlands, Germany, Denmark, Sweden, Estonia, Russia, Switzerland, Canada, and back to the U.S. I filled it with water and clipped it to a belt loop with a caribiner daily. It easy to open, eaay to clean, and doesn't leak. When we got home, my wife retired the ribbed water bottle she was using, and ordered a Nomader to use. I'm glad she got her own; otherwise, she probably would have taken mine. I love my Nomader!
customer_reviews.author: w. sharp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a trip to Europe and it was perfect! It fit in the side pocket of my backpack and rolled up nicely to fit in my suitcase. My only qualm is that the piece that secures the rolled up bottle is made of fabric. So when you wash it, it's hard not to get the fabric wet. I can see it starting to smell like a wet dog..
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: My Go-to Water Bottle. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love my Nomader! I just bought my wife one too. The new colors are cool. I got the orange and blue. I followed the instructions for cleaning the second one (e.g. boiling water soak, wash with soap, etc.). I didn’t do that the first time but it was fine. I had no issues with taste or smell. My wife’s is only used for travel and events. I use mine every day so it always has fresh water in it. It’s a perfect amount of water (more than my Swell bottles), and saves me when I travel from buying water and further adding to more plastics in the world. Get one! You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bjorn

customer_reviews.title: Customer Support is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs up for customer support. Encountered a problem on the product A YEAR AFTER PURCHASE. And they still quickly responded to my emails and resolved it by sending me a replacement. The defect was a rare one that allowed water to seep through the gap between the hard plastic mouth and the silicone body which resulted in mold growth. Other than this, the quality of the product is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very much recommended
customer_reviews.text: Disposable water bottle is well-made and quite attractive. I haven’t had any problems and I never had the problem with the aftertaste that the other reviewer’s we’re talking about
customer_reviews.author: MrsMcDSaltLyf

customer_reviews.title: Love this bottle.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've only had this for a couple of days and I already love it. Because it seals well, I can throw it any kind of bag, including my computer bag for daily use. Because the body is made of silicone, it's lighter than a stainless steel bottle and isn't hard, so I can drop it on the table or the floor and it won't dent or scratch or otherwise hurt anything. And of course, it rolls up nicely for travel. It's actually dishwasher safe on the top rack, including the strap (although you have to secure the strap so it doesn't fall into any moving parts).
customer_reviews.author: D.A.

customer_reviews.title: Lid needs to be attached!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from Haiti and my bottle did awesome! Cheaper bottles were hard to hold or stand up bc they were collapsing. The ONLY NEGATIVE was - the cap is not secured to the bottle. When you fill it there’s no place to sit the cap- that is clean. I put a carabiner on the lid to the strap but really- that needs to be corrected. Very nice that the screw on lid protects the opening you drink out of! I never collapsed my bottle! It was either empty for customs or full for drinking
customer_reviews.author: M. NEAL

customer_reviews.title: Love this bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Nomader Collapsible Water Bottle to take with me when I fly. I am trying very hard to put as little plastic as possible into the ecosystem. It worked like a champ! I was able to take it empty through the security checkouts with no difficulty, then fill it so I'd have water available. One note: you do have to ensure the drinking spout cap is well-seated before tightening, or it will leak. But that was inattention on my part. When everything is secured properly, the bottle does NOT leak! I kept ice in mine, and it does sweat when that cold, but that's to be expected. Thank you for such a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: WendyGael

customer_reviews.title: Good travel bottle
customer_reviews.text: Folds up compact and is surprisingly sturdy when full of water. It is a bit awkward to carry, so I put it in a holder that clips on my belt. It holds up (a year now), but I have noticed that it can take on an odd silicone type odor if folded for storage. So, allow it time to breathe before using it. It's a bit difficult to clean, because it isn't solid when not full (which is it's virtue).
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of a Nomader Collapsible Water Bottle. It's perfect for travel: I carry it empty through security and then fill up at a drinking fountain or water-bottle station. That alone saves me $3-5 dollars every time I fly. I use it all day, every day when I travel. It got me through Iceland, Glacier National Park, and five national parks in Utah. It has never leaked, which is very important because I'm always carrying camera equipment. It's worked so well, that it inspired my parents to buy their own as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Cool bottle but we can't get the new bottle taste ...
customer_reviews.text: Cool bottle but we can't get the new bottle taste out of it..and it's leaving a bad taste in our water. I tried white vinegar and not water. Will try to wash it again. Update June 2017. The bottles still make our water smell and taste funny. I've soaked them in light, distilled vinegar water. I've air dried them for days with the top off. I pour right from our 5 gallon alkaline water dispenser. I'm so disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Chopstick007

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: My Nomader has traveled with world with me with no problems of leakage or odor. The taste of my spicy bloody Mary's however, required a good soaking with hot water and lemons to get out, but it's fine now. Definitely add a carabiner; it makes it so much functional. (I'm surprised they don't include one) Excellent customer service. I recently had an issue with clip and they promptly replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Chiasson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bottle ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bottle. I own a white one and my son owns the blue one. My thought behind white was that if in the sun it might help and I think it does. These are great bottles. I take mine everywhere, airplanes, camping, just sitting at my desk. It helps me drink more water and save the environment a little bit by not using plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Zomp

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for the past 5 months and have beyond enjoyed it. It became my go to water bottle immediately after purchasing it. Love the size. It's large enough to carry a good amount for hikes and still for into a cup holder. Its material is lightweight and leak proof. One thing I'd like to note is that the inside of the bottle collects a film- like layer after a few days. Would recommend cleaning it every few days if consistently used.
customer_reviews.author: LV

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for travel. I hate buying water at the airport and wasting more plastic and this bottle does not give any weird taste to the water. I’m just not sure the “collar” on it is necessary. The bottle is pretty sturdy on it’s own so I think it woul be fine without it and the collar adjusting when you want to roll it up is clumsy. It’s a small thing but worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Fold and Go
customer_reviews.text: NOMADER is the brand name and that is no lie because nomader what this water bottle is not breaking, the compact sleek design for everyday use is what it is meant for, it is easily collapsible, and has 0 leaks, for the price you are getting a big deal on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: definitely the right choice
customer_reviews.text: this bottle is great -- definitely the right choice. i like that it's made of mostly silicone and that, when unfolded, it's much sturdier and more like a conventional bottle, unlike the pack-flat ones. it's easy to fill, to use, to clean; it's convenient and great to travel with. the proactive customer service is a wonderful touch, though i haven't experienced any problem.
customer_reviews.author: meggan

customer_reviews.title: Cool useful features
customer_reviews.text: I like the flexibility of this bottle. It does not roll up very small so I'm not sure that's a feature worth buying it for. It is quite leak proof though and you would really have a hard time breaking it. Also, the instructions for filling it with lemon slices and water when you get it are very useful. I do it, every couple of weeks now because I love the way it makes the bottle smell and water taste. Very easy to drink out of and I really like the strap for carrying it around.
customer_reviews.author: AKAK

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle in aqua blue color
customer_reviews.text: Love,love,love this water bottle. Have had about 6 months. Use it everyday. Water does not taste like plastic as some brands due.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, A Little Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Good quality water bottle, and it's nice it can roll up. However, I have issues with how bulky it is when rolled up. I was hoping to be able to fit this easily into a pocket of my jacket, and it's too big to comfortably walk around with it in a pocket all day. I should have considered something that looked smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Renae

customer_reviews.title: Practical and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle lives up to the hype. It worked perfectly for my trip when I needed to stay as compact as possible. There was a tiny quality glitch with my bottle but the company was super quick to fix the issue and for that, not loss of love here. I followed the sterilization directions for first use and never got a plastic taste to the water. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: iseeyou

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but don't expect the clip to stay in place in a collapsed form.
customer_reviews.text: This was great for taking with me to the airport. It's lightweight (which is what I was looking for) and sturdy enough when filled, even just partway. The only thing is the fold & attach part was designed poorly, it doesn't stay on very well and easily comes apart with movement. I also followed suggestions for doing an initial white vinegar + water soak before first use and it didn't have any weird tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

product_meta.title: Nomader Collapsible Water Bottle - Leak Proof Twist Cap - BPA Free, 22 oz
feature_bullets: PORTABLE - sturdy and comfortable to drink from; rolls up for compact travel; loops around your wrist for easy carry; attaches to your bag for quick access
DURABLE - tough enough to survive drops with its flexible, shatter-proof silicone body, ensuring you stay hydrated NOMADer the journey or activity
LEAKPROOF - eliminates leaks and spills with patented, sealing twist cap, doubling as a hygienic spout cover to keep germs off your mouthpiece
HEALTHY - made of 100% food-grade materials; free of BPA, BPS, PVC, phthalates, lead, latex, and other harmful leaching chemicals
VERSATILE - dishwasher safe; handles hot or cold drinks; freezable; collapsible; easy to refill and add ice cubes or fruit through wide mouth
